item.title: Supreme Court rejects Alex Jones' appeal of $1.4 billion Sandy Hook judgment
item.description: The Supreme Court rejected an appeal from Alex Jones, who has been ordered to pay $1.4 billion in damages to the families of victims of the 2012 Sandy...

item.title: 'It's not peace yet': Experts react after Trump declares Israel-Hamas war is over
item.description: While President Donald Trump has declared the Israel-Hamas war over, some Middle East experts say the process to end the two-year conflict is just beg...

item.title: WATCH: Gorilla smashes glass at San Diego Zoo
item.description: Eyewitness video captured the heart-stopping moment a gorilla rushed the glass at a viewing enclosure in the San Diego Zoo.

item.title: WATCH: SpaceX launches 11th test flight of Starship mega rocket
item.description: SpaceX launched another of its mammoth Starship rockets on a test flight Monday, successfully making it halfway around the world.

item.title: Former student stabs 3 staff members, plants 2 pipe bombs in California attack: Cops
item.description: A former student at a school in California allegedly stabbed three staff members and planted two pipe bombs before being arrested, police said.
